explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of Artificial Neural Networks (ANN) and genetic algorithms (GA), which are techniques within the field of machine learning.
explanations.neural network: The paper explicitly mentions the use of Artificial Neural Networks (ANN) for modeling the Mexican stock exchange.
explanations.principal components analysis: The paper uses Principal Component Analysis (PCA) as one of the statistical methods for modeling the stock exchange.
explanations.regression: The paper mentions that the methodologies used constitute an alternative to classic statistical models of regression, indicating relevance to regression techniques.
